articles.content:
Preparatory committee formed in New York 
    Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The "Federation of Koreans in the United States" inaugurated a preparatory committee in New York on July 18 to commemorate Sun's Day and celebrate February 16 in 2002. 
 Ham Song Guk, president of the federation, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The committee decided to widely propagandize the greatness of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and immortal feats performed by them in carrying out the cause of national reunification and hold multifarious functions with the approach of Sun's Day and February holiday in 2002.
